page.title: 01A General View
page.content: Our area is rural,and 90% of it is covered with farmland.The{Birmingham {to Bristol railway}runs through{Bredon village north to south ,and crosses the{Carrant Brook}to the south of Kinsham}.A lot of the streams drain into the Brook which crosses East to West before flowing into the River Avon .The villages which are in our area are:most of Bredon,Kinsham{,Aston {on Carrant},part of{Kemerton}and part of{Northway.}.Around 50% of the houses have been built in the last 10 years, so are quite new.The countryside slopes gently from north to south.A lot of minor roads connect the villages,but no major ones.Our area is mainly in the county of{Hereford and {Worcester, but to the}south of the Carrant Brook it is Gloucestershire.
